_sText:
ZM_3_ROOMS_XMAS is here, and its now bigger and with more entrances and secrets.

Some changes are here in video:



Whole changelis compared to V5 is here:
• Map is in xmas textures, xmas props added too, songs are replaced by Xmas songs, thy now play in 3 rooms and exterior too, thanx to installed speakers :P
• Teleport room is now textured and there is light too, there is also trigger_hurt to avoid CTS camp there. Now there is prop block too, so you cant barricade there.
• Elevator is now uglitchable by guns, gun block added.
• Tons of new Skip/Hints/areaportals added, its much lighter for CPU/GPU
• New spawnpoint added, Its whole new place, with new connection between "this is not room" and "broken elevator"
• New entrances to disco added: 1st Door in pipeline corridor, 2nd One time usable teleport on CT Ramp and 3th T ramp, 4th is in new teleport room
• New Teleport room next to broken elevator.
• CT ramp is little lowered and fence is deleted
• Added 64box into room1 for zombies
• Added new camp in exterior (rust watertank)
• Added new entrances for roof on Disco place
• Added new teleport in teleport room,
• Added new secretvent with teleport in new Spawnplace
• Teleport rooms and some other secret holes are now marked/flagged by Xmas stickers. So they are now easy to find :P
• Xmas lights everywhere, so there is still light when all lights are turned off
• Smoke added on chimney in exterior :D
• Fire place added for better xmas ambience

​• Small props added in "this is not room" for zombies to easier climb up
​• Invisible ladder added in secret breakable entrance between staircase and red ventcorridor
​• CT vent entrance is now 64units big, that means its now walkable, no need for crough
​• Many prop blocks added, to avoid unfair barricades
​• Map has more light, so its not dark
​​• There are more changes, but Ive already forgot about them lol
